name: O.R. Escape
description:
The worst place to be when zombies arrive is in a hospital.
The operating room is where you make your last stand.
You are the only doctor left and nothing in your knowledge is helping...

Try to survive a violent wave of zombies that are breaking into
the room, so you can escape with the cure that you and your late
colleagues managed to discover.


INSTRUCTIONS:

Use WASD to move
Move your mouse to look arround
Right click to shoot
